MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DD6 postcode area of Newport on Tay. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:45pm due to a fault on our underground cable network in the Gauldry area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:00pm on Sunday, 31 January 2021
